name: Super Totally Ultimate Dad Showdown
description:
Welcome, dad bod enthusiasts; It's time for the most anticipated event of your local neighborhood! STUDS is a 3D multiplayer party game where up to 4 players compete in a series of "dadly" events to be crowned the Ultimate Dad. Test your Dad-like Reflexes as you race baby strollers down the street, or be the first to gather all the items on the hardware store shopping list.

MULTIPLAYER MADNESS


REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER
  • Invite up to 3 friends to play online with Steam's Remote Play Together feature.
LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
  • Connect up to 4 controllers for split-screen multiplayer, or play against AI.

MINIGAMES

Choose between two unique game modes:

BABY STROLLER RACE
  • Be the first dad to cross the finish line with their stroller. Race through your neighborhood while avoiding obstacles and sabotaging other players.
THE DAD DEPOT
  • Gather the required items and bring them to the register before the other dads steal them.
